Council Members
===============

### [C. Lawrence Crump](https://www.newarknj.gov/598)

   #### 

   Council President, Council Member-At-Large

   [Email](mailto:crumpl@ci.newark.nj.us)

   Phone: [973-733-8043](tel:9737338043)
